Text:
So what's wrong with mkv? Is it mp4 much better, cause from where I stand it doesn't seem that you have to many arguments except your favorite toy: PS3...
Thanks anyway 4 the clip...
mkv files are not compressed, so there's no loss of quality

MKV & MP4 are just containers. The contents are nearly always compressed to make the files smaller for download... http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Matroska

Cheers BAT.1 kids love TS :-)
